$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/Changelog.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/Changelog
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/Changelog.text:
\define unreleased() [[Unreleased|https://github.com/benwebber/tiddlywiki-dnd/compare/v$(latest)$..HEAD]]
\define issue(number) [[#$number$|https://github.com/benwebber/tiddlywiki-dnd/issues/$number$]]
\define release(version) [[$version$|https://github.com/benwebber/tiddlywiki-dnd/releases/tag/v$version$]]
\define @(name) [[@$name$|https://github.com/$name$]]

<$vars latest={{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd!!version}}>

! <<unreleased>>
</$vars>

! <<release 1.2.1>> (2021-02-18)

!! Fixed

* Fixed incompatibility with ~KaTeX plugin that prevented spell descriptions from rendering correctly (<<issue 8>>). Thanks to <<@ lbhgh>> for reporting this bug.

! <<release 1.2.0>> (2021-02-17)

!! Added

* Added `dnd.character` macro and view template to typeset character information (class, race, alignment, languages, and factions).
* Added note tool to record extra notes associated with main tiddlers.
* Added tool to export filtered "player edition" of the wiki. This edition excludes any tiddlers that are not explicitly tagged <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/PlayerEdition}}>{{||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}}</$tiddler>.

!! Changed

* Changed ''New Creature'' icon to a dragon.
* Moved buttons to edit game tiddler attributes to tiddler toolbar.
* Embedded attribute form directly in game tiddler edit template.

!! Fixed

* Fixed display of plugin buttons in toolbar lists.
* Fixed display of qualified armour class (e.g., `15 (breastplate)`).

! <<release 1.1.0>> (2019-02-15)

!! Added

* Added `dnd.attack` macro to typeset creature melee and ranged attacks.
* Added `dnd.modifier` macro to calculate ability score modifiers independently.

!! Changed

* Make creature and spell tags configurable (<<issue 3>>).
* Refactored localization code to work with core language switcher. Nearly all user-facing strings use this framework now (<<issue 2>>).

!! Deprecated

* Deprecated `dnd.dspell` and `dnd.fspell` in favour of a single template that determines the input tiddler's type. These templates will be removed in 2.0.0.
* Deprecated `dnd.dstatblock` and `dnd.fstatblock` in favour of a single template that determines the input tiddler's type. These templates will be removed in 2.0.0.

!! Fixed

* `dnd.check` macro supports skills with spaces in the name (Animal Handling and Sleight of Hand).
* Macros which expect boolean values now only consider the string "true" true (<<issue 5>>).

! <<release 1.0.0>> (2018-08-31)

!! Added

* Added English (UK) and English (US) translations.
* Added D&D icon from Font Awesome to plugin info block.
* Set up Jest test harness, Travis CI, and Codecov.
* Added creature view template.
* Added spell macros, templates, and view templates.
* Added toolbar buttons to create new creatures and spells.
* Added modal update form for creatures and spells.

!! Changed

* Moved macro functionality to testable library.
* Ported to ~TypeScript.
* Store creature attributes as tiddler field values by default.

!! Fixed

* Use proper minus sign for ability/roll modifiers.
* `dnd.average`: Pass through unrecognized roll expressions (support arbitrary values).

! <<release 0.1.0>> (2018-07-31)

Initial release.

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/README.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/README
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/README.text:
\define .tool(_) <$vars tv-config-toolbar-text="yes" tv-config-toolbar-class=""> <$transclude tiddler="""$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/$_$""" /> \end \define .noop-tool(name, caption) <$transclude tiddler="""$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/$_$""" /> ''<>'' ({{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/images/$name$}}) \end \define .tag(_) <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/$_$}}/> \end \define .example(code) <$codeblock code="""$code$"""/> $code$ \end \define .call-row(code) `$code$`$code$ \end Manage //Dungeons & Dragons// campaigns with [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]]. ! Install [[Manually install|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Manually%20installing%20a%20plugin]] the plugin by dragging this link to your ~TiddlyWiki: <$list filter="[prefix[{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/README|$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/README|||}]]" emptyMessage="[[$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd]]" > {{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}} Then save and refresh your ~TiddlyWiki. ! Quick Start !! Create a new character Enable the <<.tool new-character>> tool to create new character tiddlers with a single click. See [[Lord Wilmore]] as an example. !! Create a new creature Enable the <<.tool new-creature>> tool to create new creature tiddlers with a single click. See [[Goblin]] as an example. !! Create a new spell Enable the <<.tool new-spell>> tool to create new spell tiddlers with a single click. See [[Alarm]] as an example. !! Notes You can add notes to non-system tiddlers using the <<.noop-tool add-note AddNote>> tool. Notes exist as separate tiddlers associated with the main tiddler (using the note tiddler's `list` field). A tiddler can have more than one note. See [[Lord Wilmore]] as an example. ! Player Edition Use the <<.tool export-player-edition>> tool to export a filtered version of your wiki to share with players. The player edition ''only includes'' tiddlers tagged <<.tag PlayerEdition>> and the plugin itself. Notes associated with those tiddlers ''will not'' appear in the player edition by default. You must tag them separately. This makes notes a great way to add private information to otherwise public tiddlers. You can easily publish or hide a tiddler using the <<.noop-tool public PlayerEdition>> tool. ! Configuration Navigate to the plugin info tiddler ([[$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd]]), then go to the ''Settings'' tab. ! Macros !! `dnd.ability` Renders an [[ability score|https://roll20.net/compendium/dnd5e/Ability%20Scores]] with its calculated modifier. <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/>
Call Output
!! `dnd.attack` Renders creature attacks. !!! Attack and damage types Attack types and damage types are localized strings. To specify an attack's type, use the following values: |! Value|! Attack Type| |`melee`|<>| |`ranged`|<>| |`both`|<>| Similarly, to specify an attack's damage type, use its English name. |! Value|! Damage Type| |`acid`|<>| |`bludgeoning`|<>| |`cold`|<>| |`fire`|<>| |`force`|<>| |`lightning`|<>| |`necrotic`|<>| |`piercing`|<>| |`poison`|<>| |`psychic`|<>| |`radiant`|<>| |`slashing`|<>| |`thunder`|<>| !!! Simple melee, ranged, or melee and ranged attacks <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> !!! Attacks with extra damage <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> !!! Attacks with conditional damage <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> !!! Attacks with extra effects <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> !!! Attacks with special targets <$macrocall $name=".example" code="""<>"""/> !! `dnd.average` Calculates the average result of the specified roll. <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/>
Call Output
!! `dnd.character` Helper macro to create a standalone character tiddler. This macro uses the [[dnd.character|$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/templates/dnd.character]] template and stores the character's attributes as tiddler fields. Automatically links class and race tiddlers if they exist. It is ''not'' necessary to use this macro if you use the automatic view template. !! `dnd.check` Typeset an ability check, optionally including a skill and/or DC. This macro is not case-sensitive. The macro matches English abbreviations of the ability names: | Ability | Code |h |<> |`str` | |<> |`dex` | |<> |`con` | |<> |`int` | |<> |`wis` | |<> |`cha` | It matches English skill names by least ambiguous prefix. For example, `perc`, `perf`, and `pers` for Perception, Performance, and Persuasion, respectively. | Skill | Least Ambiguous Prefix |h |<> |`ac` | |<> |`an` | |<> |`ar` | |<> |`at` | |<> |`d` | |<> |`h` | |<> |`ins` | |<> |`int` | |<> |`inv` | |<> |`m` | |<> |`n` | |<> |`perc` | |<> |`perf` | |<> |`pers` | |<> |`r` | |<> |`sl` | |<> |`st` | |<> |`su` | You can also use the full skill name, such as `<>` or `<>`. <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/>
Call Output
Finally, the macro supports unusual ability and skill combinations, such as asking a player to make a <> check (`<>`). !! `dnd.creature` Helper macro to create a standalone creature tiddler. This macro uses the [[dnd.statblock|$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/templates/dnd.statblock]] template and stores the creature's attributes as tiddler fields. It is ''not'' necessary to use this macro if you use the automatic view template. !! `dnd.modifier` Calculates the modifier for a given ability score. Generally you will want to use `dnd.ability` instead. <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>"""/>
Call Output
!! `dnd.spell` Helper macro to create a standalone spell tiddler. This macro uses the [[dnd.spell|$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/templates/dnd.spell]] template and stores the spell's attributes as tiddler fields. It is ''not'' necessary to use this macro if you use the automatic view template. !! `dnd.statblock` Render a creature stat block. This is a low-level macro. You may want to use the automatic view template instead (see below). !!! Notes * Ability scores default to <>. * If not set, `language` defaults to `---`. ``` <> ``` <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!dnd.statblock.state" text="show"> <$button set="!!dnd.statblock.state" setTo="show">Show <$reveal type="match" state="!!dnd.statblock.state" text="show"> <$button set="!!dnd.statblock.state" setTo="hide">Hide <> !! `dnd.xp` Renders experience points (XP) for the given challenge rating (CR). !!! Standard challenge ratings <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" /> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" /> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" /> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" />
Call Output
!!! Custom challenge ratings <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" /> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" /> <$macrocall $name=".call-row" code="""<>""" />
Call Output
! View Templates ~TiddlyWiki view templates automatically inject content into tiddlers that match certain criteria. This plugin includes view templates that style all tiddlers with certain tags. | Template | Tag | Description | Example |h |`character` |<<.tag Characters >> |Automatically render character information. |[[Lord Wilmore]] | |`note` |<<.tag Notes>> |Automatically render notes related to a tiddler. |[[Lord Wilmore]] | |`spell` |<<.tag Spells>> |Automatically render a spell description. |[[Alarm]] | |`statblock` |<<.tag Creatures>> |Automatically render a stat block. |[[Goblin]] | All templates are enabled by default. To disable them and use the equivalent macros manually, navigate to the [[plugin settings tiddler|$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd]]. ! View Toolbar Buttons The <<.noop-tool edit-attributes EditAttributes>> tool will automatically appear beside the ''{{$:/language/Buttons/Edit/Caption}}'' ({{$:/core/ui/Buttons/edit}}) tool on any character, creature, or spell tiddler (see ''View Templates'' above). The <<.tool add-note>> button automatically appears on any non-system tiddler that is ''not'' tagged as a note tiddler. You can enable or disable these buttons in the [[control panel|$:/ControlPanel]] (''Appearance > Toolbars > View Toolbar'').

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/Settings.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/Settings
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/Settings.text:
\define render-boolean(key)
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/$key$" field="text" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true" />
\end

\define edit-setting(key)
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/$key$" field="text" tag="input" />
\end

|<<dnd._lingo Settings/Version>> |{{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd!!version}} |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/CharacterTag>> |<<edit-setting "Tags/Characters">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/CreatureTag>> |<<edit-setting "Tags/Creatures">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/NoteTag>> |<<edit-setting "Tags/Notes">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/PlayerEditionTag>> |<<edit-setting "Tags/PlayerEdition">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/SpellTag>> |<<edit-setting "Tags/Spells">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/RenderCharacters>> | <<render-boolean "ViewTemplates/Character">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/RenderNotes>> | <<render-boolean "ViewTemplates/Notes">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/RenderCreatures>> | <<render-boolean "ViewTemplates/StatBlock">> |
|<<dnd._lingo Settings/RenderSpells>> | <<render-boolean "ViewTemplates/Spell">> |

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/add-.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/add-note
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/add-.caption: {{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/images/add-note}} <<dnd._lingo Buttons/AddNote/Text>>
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/add-.text: \whitespace trim \define actions() <$set name="target" filter="[]"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$(currentTiddler)$: Note" $savetitle="$:/temp/plugins/benwebber/dnd/new-note" list=<> tags={{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Notes}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{$:/temp/plugins/benwebber/dnd/new-note}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler" $param={{$:/temp/plugins/benwebber/dnd/new-note}}/> \end <$list filter="[!is[system]!tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Notes}]"> <$wikify name="text" text=<>> <$wikify name="tooltip" text=<>> <$button actions=<> tooltip=<> aria-label=<> class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/images/add-note}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text=<>/> >

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/edit.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/edit-attributes
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/edit.caption: {{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/images/edit-attributes}} <<dnd._lingo Buttons/EditAttributes/Text>>
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Buttons/edit.text: \whitespace trim \define showButtonFilter() [tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Characters}] [tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Creatures}] [tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Spells}] \end \define actions() <$list filter="[titlefields[]]" variable="field"> <$list filter="[title!has]"> <$action-deletefield $field=<> /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Modals/EditAttributes" tiddler="$(currentTiddler)$" /> \end <$list filter=<>> <$wikify name="text" text=<>> <$wikify name="title" text=<>> <$wikify name="tooltip" text=<>> <$button actions=<> tooltip=<> aria-label=<> class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/images/edit-attributes}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text=<>/>

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Modals/EditA.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Modals/EditAttributes
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Modals/EditA.subtitle: <<dnd._lingo Modals/Subtitle>>
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/Modals/EditA.text:
\define input(field)
<$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<tiddler>> field=<<__field__>> />
\end

\define creature-select-size()
<$select tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.creature.size">
  <option value="tiny"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Size/Tiny>></option>
  <option value="small"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Size/Small>></option>
  <option value="medium"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Size/Medium>></option>
  <option value="large"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Size/Large>></option>
  <option value="huge"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Size/Huge>></option>
  <option value="gargantuan"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Size/Gargantuan>></option>
</$select>
\end

\define creature-select-type()
<$select tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.creature.type">
  <option value="aberration"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Aberration>></option>
  <option value="beast"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Beast>></option>
  <option value="celestial"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Celestial>></option>
  <option value="construct"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Construct>></option>
  <option value="dragon"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Dragon>></option>
  <option value="elemental"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Elemental>></option>
  <option value="fey"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Fey>></option>
  <option value="fiend"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Fiend>></option>
  <option value="giant"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Giant>></option>
  <option value="humanoid"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Humanoid>></option>
  <option value="monstrosity"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Monstrosity>></option>
  <option value="ooze"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Ooze>></option>
  <option value="plant"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Plant>></option>
  <option value="undead"><<dnd._lingo Creature/Type/Undead>></option>
</$select>
\end

\define creature-select-ability(field)
<$select tiddler=<<tiddler>> field=<<__field__>>>
  <option value="1"><<dnd.ability 1>></option>
  <option value="2"><<dnd.ability 2>></option>
  <option value="3"><<dnd.ability 3>></option>
  <option value="4"><<dnd.ability 4>></option>
  <option value="5"><<dnd.ability 5>></option>
  <option value="6"><<dnd.ability 6>></option>
  <option value="7"><<dnd.ability 7>></option>
  <option value="8"><<dnd.ability 8>></option>
  <option value="9"><<dnd.ability 9>></option>
  <option value="10"><<dnd.ability 10>></option>
  <option value="11"><<dnd.ability 11>></option>
  <option value="12"><<dnd.ability 12>></option>
  <option value="13"><<dnd.ability 13>></option>
  <option value="14"><<dnd.ability 14>></option>
  <option value="15"><<dnd.ability 15>></option>
  <option value="16"><<dnd.ability 16>></option>
  <option value="17"><<dnd.ability 17>></option>
  <option value="18"><<dnd.ability 18>></option>
  <option value="19"><<dnd.ability 19>></option>
  <option value="20"><<dnd.ability 20>></option>
  <option value="21"><<dnd.ability 21>></option>
  <option value="22"><<dnd.ability 22>></option>
  <option value="23"><<dnd.ability 23>></option>
  <option value="24"><<dnd.ability 24>></option>
  <option value="25"><<dnd.ability 25>></option>
  <option value="26"><<dnd.ability 26>></option>
  <option value="27"><<dnd.ability 27>></option>
  <option value="28"><<dnd.ability 28>></option>
  <option value="29"><<dnd.ability 29>></option>
  <option value="30"><<dnd.ability 30>></option>
</$select>
\end

\define creature-select-challenge()
<$select tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.creature.challenge">>
  <option value="0"><<dnd.xp "0">></option>
  <option value="0 10"><<dnd.xp "0" "10">></option>
  <option value="1/8"><<dnd.xp "1/8">></option>
  <option value="1/4"><<dnd.xp "1/4">></option>
  <option value="1/2"><<dnd.xp "1/2">></option>
  <option value="1"><<dnd.xp "1">></option>
  <option value="2"><<dnd.xp "2">></option>
  <option value="3"><<dnd.xp "3">></option>
  <option value="4"><<dnd.xp "4">></option>
  <option value="5"><<dnd.xp "5">></option>
  <option value="6"><<dnd.xp "6">></option>
  <option value="7"><<dnd.xp "7">></option>
  <option value="8"><<dnd.xp "8">></option>
  <option value="9"><<dnd.xp "9">></option>
  <option value="10"><<dnd.xp "10">></option>
  <option value="11"><<dnd.xp "11">></option>
  <option value="12"><<dnd.xp "12">></option>
  <option value="13"><<dnd.xp "13">></option>
  <option value="14"><<dnd.xp "14">></option>
  <option value="15"><<dnd.xp "15">></option>
  <option value="16"><<dnd.xp "16">></option>
  <option value="17"><<dnd.xp "17">></option>
  <option value="18"><<dnd.xp "18">></option>
  <option value="19"><<dnd.xp "19">></option>
  <option value="20"><<dnd.xp "20">></option>
  <option value="21"><<dnd.xp "21">></option>
  <option value="22"><<dnd.xp "22">></option>
  <option value="23"><<dnd.xp "23">></option>
  <option value="24"><<dnd.xp "24">></option>
  <option value="25"><<dnd.xp "25">></option>
  <option value="26"><<dnd.xp "26">></option>
  <option value="27"><<dnd.xp "27">></option>
  <option value="28"><<dnd.xp "28">></option>
  <option value="29"><<dnd.xp "29">></option>
  <option value="30"><<dnd.xp "30">></option>
</$select>
\end

\define spell-select-level(field)
<$select tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.spell.level">
  <option>0</option>
  <option>1</option>
  <option>2</option>
  <option>3</option>
  <option>4</option>
  <option>5</option>
  <option>6</option>
  <option>7</option>
  <option>8</option>
  <option>9</option>
</$select>
\end

\define spell-select-school()
<$select tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.spell.school">
  <option value="abjuration"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Abjuration>></option>
  <option value="conjuration"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Conjuration>></option>
  <option value="divination"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Divination>></option>
  <option value="enchantment"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Enchantment>></option>
  <option value="evocation"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Evocation>></option>
  <option value="illusion"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Illusion>></option>
  <option value="necromancy"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Necromancy>></option>
  <option value="transmutation"><<dnd._lingo Spell/School/Transmutation>></option>
</$select>
\end

<$reveal type="nomatch" default=<<showHelp>> text="false">
<<dnd._lingo Modals/Help>>
</$reveal>

<$list filter="[title<tiddler>tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Characters}]">

|!<<dnd._lingo Character/Class>> |<<input dnd.character.class>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Character/Race>> |<<input dnd.character.race>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Character/Alignment>> |<<input dnd.character.alignment>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Character/Languages>> |<<input dnd.character.languages>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Character/Factions>> |<<input dnd.character.factions>> |
</$list>
<$list filter="[title<tiddler>tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Spells}]">

|!<<dnd._lingo Spell/Level>> |<<spell-select-level>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Spell/School>> |<<spell-select-school>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Spell/CastingTime>> |<<input dnd.spell.cast>> <$checkbox tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.spell.ritual" checked="true" unchecked="" default=""> <<dnd._lingo Spell/Ritual>></$checkbox> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Spell/Range>> |<<input dnd.spell.range>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Spell/Duration>> |<<input dnd.spell.duration>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo Spell/Components>> |<$checkbox tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.spell.verbal" checked="true" unchecked="" default=""> <<dnd._lingo Spell/Verbal>></$checkbox> <$checkbox tiddler=<<tiddler>> field="dnd.spell.somatic" checked="true" unchecked="" default=""> <<dnd._lingo Spell/Somatic>></$checkbox> <<dnd._lingo Spell/Material>>: <<input dnd.spell.material>> |
</$list>
<$list filter="[title<tiddler>tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Creatures}]">

|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Size>> |<<creature-select-size>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Type>> |<<creature-select-type>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Tags>> |<<input dnd.creature.tags>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Alignment>> |<<input dnd.creature.alignment>> |

---

|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/AC>> |<<input dnd.creature.ac>> |

|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Speed>> |<<input dnd.creature.speed>> |

---

| <<dnd._lingo StatBlock/STR>> | <<dnd._lingo StatBlock/DEX>> | <<dnd._lingo StatBlock/CON>> | <<dnd._lingo StatBlock/INT>> | <<dnd._lingo StatBlock/WIS>> | <<dnd._lingo StatBlock/CHA>> |h
| <<creature-select-ability dnd.creature.str>> | <<creature-select-ability dnd.creature.dex>> | <<creature-select-ability dnd.creature.con>> | <<creature-select-ability dnd.creature.int>> | <<creature-select-ability dnd.creature.wis>> | <<creature-select-ability dnd.creature.cha>> |

---

|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/SavingThrows>> |<<input dnd.creature.saves>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Skills>> |<<input dnd.creature.skills>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/DamageImmunities>> |<<input dnd.creature.dimm>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/DamageResistances>> |<<input dnd.creature.dres>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/DamageVulnerabilities>> |<<input dnd.creature.dvul>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/ConditionImmunities>> |<<input dnd.creature.cimm>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/ConditionResistances>> |<<input dnd.creature.cres>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/ConditionVulnerabilities>> |<<input dnd.creature.cvul>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Senses>> |<<input dnd.creature.senses>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Languages>> |<<input dnd.creature.languages>> |
|!<<dnd._lingo StatBlock/Challenge>> |<<creature-select-challenge>> |
</$list>

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate/character
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.text:
<!-- Check tiddler tag. -->
<$list filter="[<currentTiddler>tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Characters}]">
<!-- Check if user enabled view template; don't override <<currentTiddler>>. -->
<$list
  filter="[title[$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/ViewTemplates/Character]field:text[true]]"
  variable="noop"
>

<<dnd.character>>
</$list>
</$list>

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate/notes
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.text:
\define edit-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<> /> \end \define delete-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler" $param=<> /> \end <$wikify name="edit-note-text" text=<>> <$wikify name="edit-note-tooltip" text=<>> <$wikify name="delete-note-text" text=<>> <$wikify name="delete-note-tooltip" text=<>> <$list filter="[title[$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/ViewTemplates/Notes]field:text[true]]" variable="noop"> <$list filter="[titlelisted[]tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Notes}!has[draft.of]sort[created]]">
<$transclude mode="block"/>
  • <$button actions=<> aria-label=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<>>{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}
  • <$button actions=<> aria-label=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<>>{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate/spell
$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.text:
<!-- Check tiddler tag. -->
<$list filter="[<currentTiddler>tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Spells}]">
<!-- Check if user enabled view template; don't override <<currentTiddler>>. -->
<$list
  filter="[title[$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/ViewTemplates/Spell]field:text[true]]"
  variable="noop"
>

<<dnd.spell>>
</$list>
</$list>

$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate.title: $:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/ui/ViewTemplate/statblock

<$list filter="[<currentTiddler>tag{$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/Tags/Creatures}]">

  filter="[title[$:/plugins/benwebber/dnd/config/ViewTemplates/StatBlock]field:text[true]]"
  variable="noop"
>

<<dnd.creature>>
</$list>
</$list>
